title.narrative: National Policy defining government responsibility in disaster management and reconstruction

baseline.value: Law 46 of 1988 and Decree Law 919 of 1989

target.value: National policy defining government responsibility in disaster management and reconstruction;Preparation of two policy proposalsby DGR, to update Law 46 of 1988 and Decree Law 919 of 1989.National DRM Plan prepared and issued through Decree;

actual.value: Decree 4147 of November 3, 2011 established the UNGRD or Disaster Risk Management National Unit.Law 1523 of April 2012 adopted aNational Policy on Disaster Risk Management, establishing the National Disaster Risk Management and other provisions.

comment.narrative: Methodology for the inventory of settlements in high risk areas was developed.

title.narrative: % of municipalities educated, trained and aware of hazard risk reduction

target.value: At least 100% (1098) of municipalities are educated, trained and aware of hazard risk reduction

comment.narrative: The end target was expanded from 65% (714) of municipalities as a result of the Project's third restructuring.

actual.value: 91% (998) municipalities are educated, trained and aware of hazard risk reduction

comment.narrative: In June 2013, the municipalities covered by the project was estimated at 998.

title.narrative: Incorporation of Risk Management in local civic culture through environmental education

target.value: 112 municipalities have received in-depth environmental education for risk awareness

comment.narrative: The end target was expanded from 88 municipalities as a result of the Project's fourth restructuring.

actual.value: 68 municipalities (61% of the end target) have received in depth environmental education for risk awareness

title.narrative: Policy recommendations to reduce government risk exposure developed and final action plan adopted by MHCP by the end of the project

target.value: Policy recommendations to reduce government risk exposure development and final action plan adopted by MHCP by the end of theproject

actual.value: Policy Guidelines for Financial Protection Mechanisms against Disasters delivered.

title.narrative: Design and development of application software.
% of SNPAD national agencies integrated to DRIS

comment.narrative: No progress has been made for this indicatorAs indicated in the previous ISR, the development of DGR's SIGPAD was redefined inJune 2010 and new targets were set for 2011-2012.

title.narrative: Reduce the fiscal vulnerability of the State to adverse natural events by supporting the four strategic lines of action identified in the National Plan for Disaster Prevention and Management (PAD-PDO)

target.value: 58% (632) municipalities have hazard risk management programs

comment.narrative: The end target was expanded from 43% (472) municipalities as a result of the Project's fourth restructuring.

actual.value: 703 municipalities have hazard risk management programs

comment.narrative: 111% of the end target has been reached.
